item.description:
Hello Folks, Thought I'd let you know of a freedom social with the 912 group. Good chance to mingle and expand Ron Paul's ideas to a sympathetic crowd. Please RSVP to the 912 Meetup below:

Announcing a new Meetup for The New Hampshire 912 Project!

What: NH 912 & LIBERTY CHRISTMAS PARTY - TIME CHANGE TO START @ 3:00 PM

When: December 5, 2009 3:00 PM

Price: $15.00 per person

Where:
Murphy's Tap Room
494 Elm St
Manchester, NH 03101

Hi everyone!!!

We will be having a 912/Liberty Christmas Party on SAT Dec 5th @ Murphys in Manchester from 3:00 to 6:00 PM.

I HAD TO CHANGE THE TIME AS THERE WAS A CLOSE CALL ON DOUBLE BOOKING THE ROOM

We will have appetizers, dancing & blow off some steam - we sure need it!

Please RSVP at the Meet Up Site ASAP & invite a liberty rep or friends & family.

We have also extended this invitation to all the NH liberty groups & all 912 Chapters.

The deadline for RSVP will be NOV 30TH

Appetizers will be included. If we have extra cash - we buy some beer for everyone!

THE COST WILL BE $15.00 PER PERSON - CASH BAR & PAY AT THE DOOR!

Looking forward to seeing you all under happy circumstances....for once biggrin

Peace!

Pam

Learn more here:
http://www.meetup.com...
item.name: NH 912 & Liberty Christmas Party in Manchester, NH
